QuestData.Title: The Captive Bride
QuestData.Description: Of course! Lakota Windsong! Why didn't I think of this before?$B$BArnak kidnapped Lakota years ago and tried to force her into being his bride. She managed to escape, but in the chaos of the recent attack on Freewind Post, he took her again.$B$BShe has to be around here somewhere. She's become quite the mystic in recent years. I'm guessing she'll know what to do with these tauren artifacts.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lakota Windsong at Darkcloud Pinnacle in Thousand Needles.
QuestData.RewardText: It is embarrassing to have been kidnapped by Arnak again. I heard the fighting outside. Did you kill him?$B$B<The shaman looks sad for just a moment.>$B$BI am happy to be free once more. Now, how can I help you, $r?
